Package com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IKandyAudioItem
    Interface that represents the audio message Used to work with Kandy Audio messages
    IKandyChatDownloadPathBuilder  
    IKandyChatService
    This interface is used to send and receive an Instant Message (IM).
    IKandyContactItem
    This interface represents the contact (vCard) file
    IKandyCustomItem
    Handles a custom content for chat message
    IKandyEvent
    This interface represents Kandy Events such as: Kandy message IKandyMessage
    IKandyFileItem
    This interface represents the generic file, other Kandy File types that inherit from this interface: IKandyVideoItem, IKandyAudioItem, IKandyContactItem, IKandyImageItem
    IKandyImageItem
    This interface is represents the Image file
    IKandyLocationItem
    This interface represents the Location
    IKandyMediaItem
    This interface represents data included in the Kandy message IKandyMessage
    IKandyMessage
    This interface is used to set up the parameters for the IM (chat)
    IKandyTextItem
    This interface represent a simple text message
    IKandyTransferProgress  
    IKandyVideoItem
    This interface represents the Video message
    KandyChatServiceNotificationListener
    This Interface defines a callback to be invoked when a chat received.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KandyChatMessage
    The message object
    KandyChatSettings
    The settings object to configure service specific configurations
    KandyDeliveryAck  
    KandyMessageBuilder
    Creates all kinds of Kandy Messages
    KandySMSMessage  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    KandyConversationOrder  
    KandyMessageMediaItemType
    Defines the data type of the message data (Video, Audio, Image, Text, Location, Contact (vCard)
    KandyMessageType  
    KandyThumbnailSize
    Represents thumbnail size(dimensions)
    KandyTransferState
